analytics.description: This site uses your data for internal research to improve user experience.

marketing.description: This site uses your data to provide relevant advertisements, potentially involving a 3rd party.

sharing.description: This site shares your data with their affiliates, sometimes that data will be personally-identifiable.

billing.description: This site may store your payment details if you purchase something.

cookies.description: This site uses cookies to keep track of you across pages on the site.

age.description: This site requires you to be over the age of 13.
